desc: Found in the heart of lands untouched yet by man, this magical creature--held in amber--is a potent source of power.
lore: Found in the heart of lands untouched yet by man, this magical creature--held in amber--is a potent source of power. No one quite knows why it has suddenly appeared all over Grand Gaia, but some have said that a new age is about to dawn--and none are ready for it.
name: Amber Butterfly
